summary:
Dennis Bleijenburg is a business professional who is able to solve problems within process and project management. He excels in his communication skills. He understands problems inside the company and is eager to solve them. His latest job was starting up a project office and he works for several Contract Managers at Sogeti that has a top-5 ranking position in the Netherlands.
During his previous job Dennis worked in a large hospital in Amsterdam. He developed a new communication system for the hospitals new ICT Policy.  
Together with a Process Manager he worked on a process task within the Sogeti company. The aim was to study part of the current Sales Process and enhance it for the future. To develop this new process Dennis held interviews regarding the processes involved and also aligned the outcomes with those involved. The process models were documented in Visio with Dennis’s help. 
Dennis also worked as Junior Delivery Manager for an ICT company. His main task was to direct the total bid process from accept the tender to deliver the quotation to the customer. Main tasks was to look for the best resources, such as combining a team, gathering texts and adaptation of texts. 
Dennis best quality is his ability to understand and his accuracy. Mainly, he learned this by editing processes and working in a CMM-3 environment. Dennis is a team player and can boost up a team in an enthusiastic way. These characteristics influence results positively.

Three years ago he travelled for six months to Asia. His goal was to see the Asian culture in several countries. Dennis’s biggest passion is seeing different environments.  Dennis graduated ten years ago and has a Bachelor in Commercial Economics degree. During work he has undertaken several workshops and courses. For instance client conversations, ITIL, Business English and Prince2.

Specialties: Sales
Process Management
Communication Management
Project Management
Sales
Proposition
Organizer
Teambuilder
Team Manager

profile_positions.description: Two years taking care of fathers illness and work at municipality of Alphen aan den Rijn per agency.
profile_positions.title: Sabbatical

profile_positions.description: Dennis Worked for about ten months as Team Manager at Sogeti Nederland B.V. He was responsible for coordination and control of the matching process. He was a manager over a team of seven members and the main task was to act as matchmaker. Internal assignments, approximately 120 projects, must be provided with employees. Other activities were in particular maintain project planning, progress reporting, project administration, final account matching process and orientate new employees. Also he was the first contact for project managers, project employees and other stakeholders. Communication is the key word for the best progress in work, he build the communication to a good level were every stakeholder benefits.
profile_positions.title: Team Manager

profile_positions.description:
Dennis started working as a Communication Manager at a large Academic Hospital. The ICT department of the hospital had been developed more than ever in the last few years with an increasing number of ICT employees and a new process for efficient workflow management between the ICT department and the core business. Because of this professionalization, they developed a new process to implement projects more quickly than in the past.  
The IT advisory board assigned to Dennis the task of communicating to the ICT employees and managers about the core business, new processes and innovative plans for the next five years.  
After approval of the presented communication plan he carried out the task by organizing large meetings and releasing the strategic ICT plan to the core business. This plan was converted into a book and published in the organization. 
In addition to this, all managers received a folder with fact sheets regarding the latest ICT developments. Each fact sheet contained an ICT subject that should concern all the readers.  In the future the folder was to be completed with more factsheets in order to keep interested parties informed. This new communication resource guaranteed more centralization of direct communications within the business.  
By introducing new communications, the organization was kept informed in a professional manner.  The main result of this project was to raise consciousness of how essential ICT is in Health nowadays.
Keywords: Prince2, Marketing, Editing project approach, Organization development, Editing communication plan
profile_positions.title: Communication Manager AMC Amsterdam

profile_positions.description:
The process of increasing tariffs to customers was obsolete. This process needed to be updated.  
To describe the process Dennis interviewed several colleagues who managed the process in general.  The current process was designed with the help of the process tool Visio and a Process Manager. After this the process was fine tuned and introduced to Sales Management.  Implementation of the proposition was carried out by colleagues.
Keywords: Process Management, Pronto (Process Management approach Sogeti), Organization Counseling, Customer Registration System, Visio
profile_positions.title: Proces Management

profile_positions.description:
Bid Management provided support for the commercial division.  
It takes care of the creation of high-quality offers and offers for large Result Obliged Mandates (RVO) in the governance sector. Account Management and Contract Management assess whether Sogeti actually has a chance to qualify for inclusion. The Bid Manager leads the tender process from start to finish.
As a Bid Manager Dennis was the executive responsible for leads. Planning and managing the lead was one of the major tasks.  For the larger projects he acted as team member and upgraded texts, references, curriculum vitae and other relevant information of colleagues. With the help of his high quality of work, the company won a lot of tenders.
Keywords: project planning, Project Administration/Security, Process Management, Document Management
profile_positions.title: Bidmanager

profile_positions.description:
As recruiter he adopted an active approach to the labor market in order to recruit perfect candidates for the company.  To provide a constant stream of valuable résumés based on the current demand.  Also receiving and guiding applicants on location, have been a main part of his core tasks.
In a short time, he managed to sustain the core values of the company and even more! He distinguished himself by his communication skills, initiative and ability to absorb the basic knowledge of the organization.
Keywords: Business Information Systems, Human Resource, Administrative tasks
profile_positions.title: Recruiter

profile_positions.description:
Part time job at one of largest banks in the Netherlands. Dennis worked in a group of eight employees and he was responsible of two systems for migration. The information in the old PIT system was to be migrated to the new Clarity system. He compared both systems for errors, made corrections and migrated the information to the Clarity system.  Dennis undertook the leading role of the group and reported to the Bank Manager. In general, focus was on Data Integrity Assurance, change and correction tasks.
Keywords: Financial systems, Managerial, General Bank knowledge
profile_positions.title: Team Manager ING

profile_positions.description: Dennis travelled to Asia. It was a half year trip and he has seen the Asian culture in five different countries. Dennis’s biggest passion is seeing total different cultures in comparison with the western culture. The challenge was to achieve his goal with a low budget.
profile_positions.title: Globetrotter

profile_positions.description:
At a Cooperative Food concern at the Consumer Service department, he worked as a Desk Employee.  His task was to handle complaints and notifications from customers, satisfy them in their needs and inform other departments if necessary.  Of course within the agreed obligations of the concern and importance.  This project lasted for two-and-a-half months.
Keywords: project administration, complaints registration, helpdesk.
profile_positions.title: Desk Employee

profile_positions.description:
For a German Chemical company, trading in additives and emulsifiers, he executed the function Customer Service Representative. Dennis was responsible for the acquisition, maintaining contact with customers and vendors and commercially supporting the chemical specialists. He also contacted the customers by phone in case of delayed payments. The company was disappointed when he decided to quit his job.
Keywords: Chemistry, distribution, complaints registration, logistics, order handling, sales, sales administration.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Representative

profile_positions.description:
After his good performance in sales support he concentrated more on commercial activities. For instance he maintained contact with customers to note their demands and orders. To prevent delayed deliveries, Dennis negotiated with vendors in Sweden and Denmark to get his order as soon as possible. Besides his main task, he wrote and changed several manuals to improve and fine-tune the processes.
Keywords: commercial activities,set up user guide, Business Information Systems, documentary, customs, logistics, order handling, sales, sales administration, process management proceedings, process establishment.
profile_positions.title: Sales Office Staff

profile_positions.description:
At a prominent international concern in the Machine Industry Dennis started as a Sales Support representative in the Parts and Service department.  Order handling was his main task.  This consisted of monitoring of data in sales systems, managing the Sales Team, formalizing the tendering and quotations processes and delivering to the customer.  In addition to this, he liaised with the IT department by creating queries for data overviews in order to keep management informed in a timely manner.  Moreover, his job responsibility was to administer and archive all the sales and product documentation.
Keywords: Business Information Systems, documentary, financial administration, logistics, order handling, sales administration, stock administration.
profile_positions.title: Sales Support
